Methods

logException(exception)

Log exception manually to Hike's exception handler and reporting
Parameters:
Name Type Description
exception object Exception JSON which could contain stuff like error message, line number, column number and stack trace.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
metadata object <optional>
 Metadata to be attached with each exception
